text: Natalie Trundy (born Natalie Trundy Campagna, August 5, 1940 â€“ December 5, 2019) was an American actress. She was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She was known for her roles as Albina in Beneath the Planet of the Apes, Dr. Stephanie Branton in Escape from the Planet of the Apes and as Lisa in both Conquest of the Planet of the Apes and Battle for the Planet of the Apes. Trundy died in Los Angeles on December 5, 2019 at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Natalie Trundy
